locations.name: Sophie's Bedroom
locations.description: A 5-year-old girl's small bedroom in a Portland, Oregon apartment. Lavender-painted walls with glow-in-the-dark star stickers on the ceiling. A twin bed with a purple guardrail and purple star-print bedding. A small white bookshelf overflowing with picture books. A wooden toy chest with a painted rainbow on the front. A hamster cage sits on top of a low white dresser â€” golden Syrian hamster with exercise wheel, water bottle, wood shavings bedding, and a small plastic hideout. A moon-shaped nightlight plugged into the wall near the bed. Child's drawings and finger paintings taped to the walls with masking tape. A soft lavender rug on hardwood floor. A small table with crayons and coloring books. Cozy, creative, child's space.

locations.name: Shared Apartment Bathroom
locations.description: Small shared bathroom in a Portland apartment used by Sophie and her mom Kate. White subway tile walls, gray tile floor. Single sink with chrome faucet and a white plastic step stool so Sophie can reach. Round mirror above sink. Toilet with a child's potty training seat adapter still on top. Bathtub with a light blue shower curtain decorated with fish. Child-friendly elements: purple kids' toothbrush in a frog-shaped holder, bubble bath bottles on tub edge, rubber ducks (yellow and pink), a green hooded frog towel hanging on a low hook Sophie can reach. Mom's toiletries on a shelf above child's reach. Bright overhead light.

locations.name: Kindergarten Classroom
locations.description: A bright, colorful kindergarten classroom at a Portland public elementary school. Alphabet banner running along the top of the walls. Cubbies with name labels near the door for coats and backpacks. Small round tables with tiny chairs in primary colors (red, blue, yellow, green). Art supply station with crayons, finger paint jars, construction paper, glue sticks, child-safe scissors. A cozy reading corner with bean bag chairs and a small bookshelf. Calendar wall with weather chart and class schedule. A fish tank with two goldfish on a counter near the window. Dramatic play area with a toy kitchen and plastic food. Coat hooks along one wall. Large windows showing Portland trees and gray sky. Colorful rugs with letters/numbers on the floor. Teacher's desk in the corner.
